name: [TEST] Get profile status
description: Get Glimps detect profile status, it includes quotas, eastimated analysis duration and cache

daily_quota.title: Daily Quota
daily_quota.description: Number of submissions authorized for the profile within 24h

available_daily_quota.title: Available Daily Quota
available_daily_quota.description: Number of submissions still available within 24h. It's a sliding window, so a new slot will be released 24h after each submission

cache.title: Cache
cache.description: If True, the profile is configured to use cached result by default

estimated_analysis_duration.title: Estimated Analysis Duration
estimated_analysis_duration.description: Estimation of the duration for the next submissions in milliseconds. It's based on the average time of submissions and the submission queue state. The real duration could differ from the estimation
